Class Maths

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.core.matrix.Maths
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RevisionHandler

    public class Maths
extends java.lang.Object
implements RevisionHandler
    Utility class.

    Adapted from the JAMA package.

    Version:
    $Revision: 1.3 $
    Author:
    The Mathworks and NIST, Fracpete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
